sn56.29:1.3: Dukkham ariyasaccam, dukkhasamudayam ariyasaccam, dukkhanirodham ariyasaccam, dukkhanirodhagamini patipada ariyasaccam—
sn56.29:1.5: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, catunnam ariyasaccanam atthi ariyasaccam parinneyyam, atthi ariyasaccam pahatabbam, atthi ariyasaccam sacchikatabbam, atthi ariyasaccam bhavetabbam.
sn56.29:2.2: Dukkham, bhikkhave, ariyasaccam parinneyyam, dukkhasamudayam ariyasaccam pahatabbam, dukkhanirodham ariyasaccam sacchikatabbam, dukkhanirodhagamini patipada ariyasaccam bhavetabbam.
sn56.29:3.1: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, ‘idam dukkhan’ti yogo karaniyo …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yogo karaniyo”ti.
